column4: I sure wish the proprietary drivers for my ATI card didn't suck. >.>
Actually, I"m just mad at them for not supporting xv output
i use free radeon drivers and have xv
Can I do that with my ATI All-in-Wonder Radeon 8500 DV? ^^
I'm a clueless semi-newbie...? I don't suppose there's some kind of handy how-to? :3
i can't find any. the propietary drivers don't work for you?
They work, they just don't support xv when I'm playing video files, and they tend to look bad/lag without it. o.O
too bad. Is extrange that they don't support xv
Where do I get the drivers you use? Maybe I could figure it out. :3
they come whit ubuntu man radeon
i have pasted my xorg.con here http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/2113 (make backups)
Hmmm... I just changed the driver to "radeon" in xorg.conf and it seems to be working... :3
Though it seemed to be working before I restarted X... >.> I have no idea why it would be.
Guess I don't need to know the why as long as it works. :D
